questions.question: A train traveling at a speed of 60 km/h covers a distance of 360 km. What is the time taken by the train to cover the distance?
If 2x + 3y = 10 and x - y = 2, find the value of x.
A rectangular plot of land has a length of 100 meters and a width of 50 meters. What is the area of the plot?
A company has a profit of Rs. 10,000 per month. What is the annual profit of the company?
A car covers a distance of 240 km in 4 hours. What is the average speed of the car?
Find the sum of the first 10 natural numbers.
A cube has a volume of 27 cubic centimeters. What is the length of one side of the cube?
Find the value of x in the equation: 2x - 5 = 15
A shopkeeper sells a product for Rs. 1,000 at a profit of 20%. What is the cost price of the product?
Find the area of a triangle with a base of 10 cm and a height of 8 cm.
